tip_0: When Ekko is low hp and you feel that he is about to use his ultimate, ignite him. This will lower the heal.
tip_1: Ekko will generally buy a Zhonyas, This allows him time to think about his combo aswell as gives his Ghost time to get right where he Zhonyad and BOOM He ults e and goes all out instantly going from 100 to 0 In like 3 seconds, Be very Careful!
tip_2: In lane, while Ekko's Timewinder is on cooldown, he is very vulnerable to poke/all-in, since all he will have is a small dash to escape. Try to get close and poke him if he misses it, but if he lands it then wait for the passive stacks to wear off.
